message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I believe I can offer you $12000 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I am willing to pay $12500 for the product.
I understand you're trying to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $13250? It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I would like to offer $13000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we settle on $13100? It's the best I can do.
Considering your last offer, I am willing to pay $13050 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm at my minimum price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13050, but that's the final offer.
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to pay $13000 for the product.
